skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Easy Medical Device is the place to learn about Medical Device Regulation and Standards. You´ll receive free information, free documents to download, free online course to participate. All this to provide value to the Medical Device Community.
Don´t forget to listen also my podcast with the alexa skill "Medical Device Podcast"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
